name: 2048 Friends Pro
description:
This application is a puzzle, which is based on the 2048 game.
User has to swipe to move the tiles. Whenever two tiles have same Friend Image, they merge into a more Friend Image. When 2048 Friend tile is created, user will win.


Features:

- Selection of friends from friend list.
- User can replay game.
- User can see current score and best score.
- User can see point table for puzzle.


Game Description:

- Firstly, user has to select 11 friends from his/her friend list.
- Next click on Play button.
- User has to swipe (left, right, top, bottom) to move the tiles. Whenever two tiles have same Friend Image, they merge into a more Friend Image.
- When 2048 Friend tile is created, user will win.

Note: User must have minimum 11 Friends and App is for iPhone only.
